name: bumblebee-hotword
description: A minimalist hotword / wake word for the web, based on Porcupine

scripts.build-basic: cd examples/basic-example && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build-full: cd examples/full-example && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build-all: npm run build-basic && npm run build-full && npm run copy-basic && npm run copy-full

author: Jaxcore Software Inc
